topic.title: Deep Neural Networks
topic.description: Which papers talk about Deep Neural Networks?
topic.narrative: Relevant papers have at least one mention of Deep Neural. Paper containing only Deep or Neural are not relevant.

topic.title: Information Retrieval
topic.description: Which papers talk about Information Retrieval?
topic.narrative: Relevant paper have at least one mention of Information Retrieval. Paper containing only Information or Retrieval are not relevant.

topic.title: Analysis for Android apps
topic.description: Which papers talk about the analysis of android apps?
topic.narrative: Relevant papers talk at least in one line about android apps. Paper containing only apps are not relevant.

topic.title: The University of Amsterdam
topic.description: Which papers are created by the University of Amsterdam?
topic.narrative: Relevant papers are created or at least co-written by the University of Amsterdam. Paper containing only University not relevant.

topic.title: Neural Ranking for eCommerce Product Search
topic.description: Which paper is about Ranking Product Search and its applications in eCommerce?
topic.narrative: Relevant papers that addresses application of Task Models and Textual Embeddings in the field of electronic commerce. Not relevant are papers showcasing applications that do not contain the topic eCommerce.
